URGENT RESPONSE NEEDED!!!



ASSOCIATION OF UK
 
HELLO ..I AM JAMES MORGAN NOTICE MAN OF 
ASSOCIATION OF UK..BRING YOU THIS INFORMATION. 

THIS MESSAGE IS SAID TO BRING TO YOUR NOTICE BY OUR DIRECTOR B.A 
BADTHOMSIN...PLEASE THERE WAS A  LADY  THAT CAME TO OUR COUNTRY DOWN 
HERE IN UK WITH HER HUSBAND AND 2KIDS. 


ON THE 30TH OF NOVEMBER 2005 THE LAST MONTH ..THAT JUST PASS AWAY..THE 
LADY DIE AS A RESULT OF CAR   ACIDENT IN UK WITH HER HUSBAND BY THE 
MANBER STREET UK. 


THE GOVERNMANET OF UK MADE A SEARCH AND DISCOVER THIS LADY HAVE ABOUT 
(1.7 MILLION UK POUNDS ) IN HER ACCOUNT..AND WHEN THE MONEY WILL BE CONVERTED TO 
DOLLARS WE DISCOVER THE MONEY IS ABOUT $300,000,00.00.AND THAT IS A REALLY LOT 
OF BIG MONEY. 


WE ARE REALLY VERY HAPPY THAT THE KIDS WERE NOT DEAD AND THEY RE STILL 
IN THE HOPSITAL HERE IN MC.MANAMA HOSPITAL IN UK RECIVING A VERY GOOD 
TREATEMENT.PLEASE WE WANT A VERY GOOD PERSON  WHO IS VERY HONEST AND READY 
AND WILLING TO HAVE THE 2KIDS TO HIM OR HER SELF AND TAKE GOOD LOOK OF THE 
KIDS..AND MORE OVER THE PERSON WILL HVE THE WHOLE MONEY IN IS ACCOUNT AND MAKE 
SURE HE REALLY TAKE GOOD CARE OF THE KIDS WITH THE MONEY..THEIR PARENTS LEFT FOR 
THEM.WE THE ASSOCIATION GROUP IN UK WILL LIKE ANYONE TO VOLUNTIER HIM SELF OR 
HER SELF WITH A VERY GOOD AND HONEST MAN OR WOMAN..AND WE THE  GROUP 
ASSOCIATION WILL ALWAYS COME AND LOOK THE KIDS EVERY LAST WEEK OF THE MOUNTH. 



WE WANT TO INFORM YOU THAT IF U KNOW THAT YOU ARE WILLING TO TAKE GOOD 
CARE OF THE KID AND U CAN DO ANYTHING TO MAKE THE KID HAPPY AND MORE OVER DO 
ACORDING TO WHT THE Uk  GOVERNMENT SAY SO THAT YOU ALSO GET THE 
$300,000,000.00 INSIDE YOUR ACCOUNT PLEASE EMAIL US AND TELL US ALL INFORMATION 
ABOUT UR SELF AND ALL EVERYTHING ABOUT YOUR LIFE.AFTER EVERY INFORMATION ABOUT 
YOU THEN WE SHALL GIVE YOU THE EMAIL OF THE BANK WHO ARE IN CHARGE OF THE MONEY 
AND DISCUSS WITH THEM ON WHT TO DO TO GET THE MONEY. 


BEST REGARD 
MR LAWSON  SMITH
